name: Epoh
description:
Your goal is to find a way out. Don't run out of hope! Make sure to stay in a work area when check up timer runs out. 

Controls: arrow keys for movement and [G] for pickaxe

Coding and graphic: trito - Therese Andersson
Music by Tim beek: https://timbeek.itch.io/dystopian

This is a submission to Kodsnacks spelsylt: https://itch.io/jam/spelsylt6
The theme for the game jam was "hopp".
